post.author: 황성규
post.content: 마우스로 공을 클릭해 보세요. 자신의 점수를 코멘트란에 적어보면 어떨까요? <OBJECT classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" ID=movie codebase="http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=4,0,0,0" WIDTH="600" HEIGHT="495"> <PARAM NAME=movie VALUE="http://www.spikything.com/games/kickups/kickups.swf?online=1"> <PARAM NAME=loop VALUE=false> <PARAM NAME=menu VALUE=false> <PARAM NAME=quality VALUE=high> <PARAM NAME=bgcolor VALUE=#000000> <EMBED src="http://www.spikything.com/games/kickups/kickups.swf?online=1" loop=false menu=false quality=high bgcolor=#000000 WIDTH="600" HEIGHT="495" NAME=movie TYPE="application/x-shockwave-flash" PLUGINSPAGE="http://www.macromedia.com/shockwave/download/index.cgi?P1_Prod_Version=ShockwaveFlash"> </EMBED> </OBJECT>
post.title: 공차기게임
